001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.HashSet;
005import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
006import java.util.Set;
007import java.util.TreeSet;
008
009public enum SupportedDevices {
010    ALL(KnownDeviceModel.TSLIM_X2, KnownDeviceModel.MOBI),
011    TSLIM_X2_ONLY(KnownDeviceModel.TSLIM_X2),
012    MOBI_ONLY(KnownDeviceModel.MOBI),
013    ;
014
015    private final Set<KnownDeviceModel> models;
016    SupportedDevices(KnownDeviceModel... models) {
017        this.models = new TreeSet<>();
018        this.models.addAll(Arrays.asList(models));
019    }
020
021    public Set<KnownDeviceModel> getModels() {
022        return models;
023    }
024
025    public boolean supports(KnownDeviceModel model) {
026        return this.models.stream().anyMatch(m -> m == model);
027    }
028}
